content:
So our current options are:

  • Home
  • Private messages
  • Starred messages
  • Mentions

Which I feel has a couple weaknesses:

1. Starred messages are completely different than mentions and private messages, so it should either come in second (after home) or last on the list.
2. Is the word messages necessary? I feel like that isn't parallel with the lack of word "messages" in the "Home" and "Mentions" tabs. Possibly just remove the word?
1. is hard to change unless we get rid of "messages", since it looks ugly if we change the order to putter starred at the end
My concern with dropping "messages" is that I think it would be more confusing for new users to have it just say "Private".

Well rishi's idea was to change the ordering to:

  • Home
  • Starred messages
  • Private messages
  • Mentions

If we didn't want to remove messages.
hmm. I guess I feel like "Starred messages" is less important and thus shouldn't be in the #2 position.

My vote:

  • Home
  • Starred
  • Mentioned
  • Private messages

It preserves these similarities:

  • PMs are close to Stream messages (where most people spend most of their time)
  • Starred and Mentioned are kindred spirits IMHO (neither expand, both are especially-important messages)
I also think we eventually want to style "Private messages" mores similarly to "STREAMS".
Another option is to add 'Group messages' in addition to PMs

What about:
- Home
- Mentions
- Private Messages
- Starred Messages
I like grouping the first three together since they're the source of notifications and I almost never use starred messages or get notifications from them
